item.title: [WIP] Building Multilingual Parallel Corpus
item.description: I am joining a new project about language models and my primary focus is on constructing parallel corpora across languages. Multilingual LLM Multilingual Capability of LLM ChatGPT is not a perfect multilingual model Illustrated comparison of 200 languages translated from English into various target languages, sorted by their language scores in ChrF++ for ChatGPT. Source: (Lu et al. 2023) Related Work As I progress with this project, I am documenting noteworthy related works for future references.

item.title: Introduction to Combinatorial Optimization
